start_ext_country_text.message:
After the extension is pinned you can use the full functionality.
Click the extension's icon and choose the country.
The extension will automatically connect to the selected server.
Enjoy Free-VPN.pro - Free Unlimited VPN.

Make sure you do not have another extension installed with proxy or VPN functionality.
If there are other installed extensions Free-VPN.pro may not work correctly.

start_ext_menu_text.message:
To access the extension, click on the puzzle piece icon in the upper right corner of your browser.
After clicking on the icon, a menu opens with a list of all installed extensions.

start_ext_pin_text.message:
Opening the extension menu shows a list of extensions.
Each extension in the list has a pin icon on the right side of the menu. Clicking this icon pins the extension.
Once the extension is pinned, its action button remains in the toolbar.

start_text.message: Three simple steps left to complete the installation and access the full extension functionality
